software.description:
The Brain Coactivation Map describes all the coactivation networks in the human brain based on the meta-analysis of more than 5,400 neuroimaging articles (from NeuroSynth) containing more than 16,000 individual experiments. It also provides a list of the MeSH tags that more closely match the structure of each network.
You can use our viewer CoactivationMap (https://github.com/r03ert0/CoactivationM...) to interactively browse the map, or our command line cmtool (https://github.com/r03ert0/cmtool) to query the map from a shell.
